name: R/C Car Off-Road Racing- Radio Controlled Nitro Buggy Simulator Game PRO
name_original: R/C Car Off-Road Racing- Radio Controlled Nitro Buggy Simulator Game PRO
description:
Rev up your engines and get ready to tear it up in this R/C Car simulator. Drive as fast as you can along a snowy road before time runs out. Do you have what it takes to handle an extreme RC car?

Features
-Awesome 3D Graphics
-3 car configurations to choose from
-Realistic Physics
